import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assets/crown.svg' import { auth } from '../../firebase/firebase.utils' import CartIcon from '../cart-icon/cart-icon.component' import CartDropdown from '../cart-dropdown/cart-dropdown.component' import './header.styles.scss' const Header = ({ currentUser, hidden }) => { return (
SHOP CONTACT {currentUser ? (
auth.signOut()}> SIGN OUT
) : ( SIGN IN )}
) } const mapStateToProps = ({ user: { currentUser }, cart: { hidden } }) => { return { currentUser, hidden, } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header)
